title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.7 - Designation of panels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.7 - Designation of panels

State Regulations

The Appellate Division shall designate
the attorneys for children panel for each county from attorneys recommended by
the advisory committees. Appointments to the panel shall not exceed one year, but any panel member may be reappointed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
679.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
